about.details:
Incorporated in June 2012, Interiors & More Limited trades, imports, and sells artificial flowers. The company manufactures and trades quality artificial flowers, plants, and decor items for homes and offices.

The manufacturing facility, which is fully furnished with all the necessary tools for production, test equipment for quality control, and additional handling supplies to enable efficient assembly and simple logistics, is located in Gujarat.

The company has expanded to various locations over the years, including Mumbai and Delhi, with the factory operating from Umbergaon.

The company has two well-equipped manufacturing units. One is located in Umargam, Gujarat and measures 57,000 Sq. ft. The other unit is situated in Umbergaon, Gujarat and measures 7,000 Sq. ft. Both units have computer systems, internet connectivity, communication equipment, security, and other necessary facilities for its business operations to function smoothly.

The company offers various products, including artificial flowers such as Roses, Yellow Marigolds, Green Grass in Mats, green Leaves, carnations, Hydrangea, and Hanging orchids. In addition, the company trades in Fountains, battery-operated Candles, Chandeliers, vases made of Wood and Glass, artificial trees, Furniture, and Tables.

Interiors & More Limited curates exhibitions across India.

As of December 31, 2023, the company has 93 permanent employees.

The company's main corporate office is located in Fort, Mumbai. Here, the company manages all its administrative and reporting needs and factory support.

faqs.question: What is the Interiors and More IPO?
faqs.answer:
Interiors and More IPO is a SME IPO of 1850400 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹42.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹227 per share. The minimum order quantity is 600.

The IPO opens on February 15, 2024, and closes on February 20, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Interiors and More IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Interiors and More IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Interiors and More IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Interiors and More IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Interiors and More IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Interiors and More IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Interiors and More IPO opens on February 15, 2024 and closes on February 20, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Interiors and More IPO?
faqs.answer: Interiors and More IPO lot size is 600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,36,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Interiors and More IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Interiors and More IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Interiors and More IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Interiors and More IPO will be done on Wednesday, February 21, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, February 22, 2024. Check the Interiors and More IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Interiors and More IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Interiors and More IPO listing date is on Friday, February 23, 2024.
